Catdate.dialogue: You know, 30 minutes ago when I was walking through the city, I didn't expect to be going on a date with an anthropomorphic animal, yet here we are.
Sitting in the park, having a picnic and eating to our hearts' content.
We got some fish from a local fish store here. It wasn't exactly cheap, but it was cheaper than just handing over my wallet, phone, and money.
Funny how a fantasy world takes real-world currency. How convenient is that!
Elliot sure does seem to love the fish. It seems like he hasn't eaten in days. I'm kind of concerned for him.
These fishies are DELICIOUS! I can't believe we have so many of these.

[ Gatekeep the fish ] (press UP)
[ Give him more fish ] (press DOWN)
Yeah, they seem really good. You take as many as you want.
Now THAT'S what I'm talking about!
So why were you robbing people in that back alley?
That thought has not at all crossed your mind until a second ago?
In all fairness, I was wondering why such a cute kitty cat was roaming the streets but I never got to ask you until now.
Well, it's complicated.
I can handle it.
You're quite persistent, aren't you?
Persistent is my middle name.
I've noticed.
I'm homeless, okay. I got kicked out at 18, and ever since I've been trying to get something going, but it's hard.
Oh, I'm sorry for making you say that.
It's okay. It's part of who I am. I've been trying to work odd jobs as much as possible, but sometimes there just aren't any, and I have to get money in alternative ways.
Seems like I picked a good target, though. Haven't had the police called on me, and I'm munching on these delicious fishies! I am sorry for trying to rob you, though.
I hope we can still be friends and forget about this whole robbing thing.
Yeah, of course. Would be a shame if I let such a cutie slide right past me.
Stop calling me cute! Don't you see the fierce testosterone-rilled man in front of you?
Is the fierce testosterone-rilled man in the room with us right now?
Very funny...
Thank you, I try.
You do know that you're supposed to be nice to your date, right? You don't seem to be too bright on the dating front.
Oh, I know, I just think you're cute when you're annoyed.
I'm beginning to think you're a lost cause.
Oh, come on, I'm not that terrible.
Okay, maybe I am that terrible.
To be fair, you did get me loads of fishies, so I guess you're not all that terrible.
You're making me feel like your personal Santa Claus.
It's because you are, and I don't mind it one bit.
Well then, how about you sit on Santa's lap?
Do you think I'm that cheap? You're going to have to take me out more if you want to order me around. Besides, I ate all the fishies. Since they are all gone, I have no reason to stay.
Are you sure you don't want to stay a little longer?
I have business to take care of, so I think it's best if I leave meow. But if I find you again, I'll gladly let you take me out a second time.
Am I going to have to bribe you with fish again?
Depends on how badly you want to go on a second date.
Is that a yes?
Well, if a certain sugar babe were to come along with some fish, I see no reason to deny a second date. But since you have none right now, your time's up.
I usually hang out around the city, so if you're looking for me, you know where to find me.
You do want to go out on another date, right?
Press W to decline another date. Press S to agree to another date

smallangry.dialogue: Wow okay DICKHEAD. Way to freaking gate keep me!
OW OW OKAY NO NEED TO SCRATCH

angry.dialogue: WOW, WAY TO FREAKING GATEKEEP ME YOU JERK!

OW OW OKAY NO NEED TO SCRATCH
Bad ending 1, press up to retry the date

happy.dialogue: Yeah, I knew you would! See you then!
